Job title: FINANCIAL CONSULTANT – ASUREWEALTH
Company Name: ASUREWEALTH representing Income Insurance limited.
FINANCIAL CONSULTANT – ASUREWEALTH
ASUREWEALTH representing Income Insurance limited.
A career that makes a difference.
Looking for an entrepreneurial role with flexibility and unlimited income potential?
Whether you are a fresh graduate or an experienced professional looking for a change, join us to discover more about the career as a Financial Consultant.
Key responsibilities:
Assess clients’ financial situation to develop strategies to help clients meet their financial goals.
Provide advice on insurance to help companies and individuals plan for their financial futures.
Help clients with financial planning in areas such as retirement, education, and investments with our full product suite.
Review and follow up with clients on a regular basis to assess how developments in their life might affect their financial plan.
Preparing and interpreting financial document summaries, investment performance report and income projections for clients.
Build and maintain effective relationships with existing clients.
Job Requirements:

 Minimum full certificate in GCE 'A' Level, International Baccalaureate Diploma qualification, diploma awarded by a polytechnic in Singapore or equivalent.


 At least 21 years old.


 Related work experience is not required.

Benefits & Rewards
Provide clients with access to wide range of insurance products
Through an introducer arrangement which Income Insurance Limited (Income) has with Infinitum Financial Advisory, a wholly owned subsidiary of Income.
Training and professional development
We’ll help you gain the certifications, soft skills, and knowledge you need to succeed while supporting your growth with structured courses and trainings. Our dedicated managers will constantly be there to guide you through your developmental journey.
EXCELeration Programme
We provide a structured corporate financing scheme up to for the first 18 months of your career to fast-track your success in Income.
Overseas trips and rewards
Work hard and play hard with us as we incentivize our top performers to destinations such as Cape Town, St Petersburg, Zurich, and other cities.
Flexible incentive structure
Enjoy unlimited potential income through our multi-layered incentive structure that includes commissions, quarterly performance-based incentives, annual bonuses, and great incentive trips.
Other benefits
Enjoy medical benefits and get covered under group insurance. We will make sure you are well looked after so that you can concentrate on providing sound financial advice to your clients.
To apply, please send in your resume. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
ASureWealth is a group of authorised representatives of Income Insurance limited. Income is one of the leading composite insurers in Singapore today, offering life, health and general insurance.

Image Engine Pte LtdA part of Clarion Events Group (UK headquartered), Image Engine is a leading full-service B2B technology event producer and organiser. Our flagship portfolio – GovWare, supports a global community of cybersecurity experts and practitioners, business leaders, industry innovators and policymakers through delivering innovative content, critical business intelligence sharing and connectivity.
Executive, Client ServicesReporting to the Sales Manager, Client Services will assist in upholding excellent service levels to maximise client experience, so as to ensure client rebooks, and to grow the client portfolio of an established brand.
Responsibilities:

 Maintaining current clients and growing our customer base.
 Follow up on any leads and general enquiries, responding in a timely and efficient manner.
 Ensure that all opportunities are pursued and relationships cultivated in a timely manner.
 Coordinate and lead regular ‘keep in touch’ client meetings.
 Sales administrative duties including contract negotiation, collections and after-sales- service with the intention to provide a holistic customer experience for the sponsors / exhibitors (SPEX).
 Communicate Organiser’s requirements to SPEX (prospectus submissions, booth allocation, booth graphics, marketing materials, SPEX and customer registration etc.), including onsite SPEX management.
 Work with Sales Manager to execute and manage rebooking campaigns.
 On a weekly basis, report on enquiries received, lost and developed.
 Effectively collaborate with other internal departments including operations, marketing and finance to maximise client experience.
 Visit and canvass at competitor and industry events and develop a systematic understanding of ecosystem and monitoring of competitors.

Essential skills or Experience

 At least 2 years of sales experience, preferably in the events industry.
 Ability to build long-term relationships with the existing sponsorship clients
 Demonstrated flexibility to manage multiple tasks, solve problems and work effectively in a fast-paced environment
 Excellent written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills
 Proficient in Microsoft Office and Salesforce
 Willingness to have fun and collaborate with others in a team-oriented environment

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: $3,000.00 - $3,500.00 per month
Benefits:

 Additional leave
 Flexible schedule
 Health insurance
 Work from home

Schedule:

 Flexible hours
 Monday to Friday

Supplemental pay types:

 Commission pay
 Performance bonus

License/Certification:

 permit/visa/residency status to work in Singapore (Required)

Expected Start Date: 01/05/2022

Job Type: Freelance 
    
    
     Job Location: Remote 
    
   
  
 
 
  The Virtual Expert is the main point of contact with the client(s) and will work independently with the client(s). The VE will receive support from their assigned a supervisor, who will assist the VE<>client relationship with plan modifications, questions, and provide feedback on quality, delegation issues, and more. 
   The VE will provide a high-level professional service by working on tasks and projects as assigned by the client, and ensuring they are executed on time and to the highest level of quality. The VE is responsible for being the main point of contact for their assigned clients, and being familiar with each client’s needs and preferences. The VE must have consistent and proactive communication with clients and supervisors. Virtual Experts are expected as part of their contract to take an agreed-upon number of client hours, respond to all communication within the two-hour response window, maintain detailed and up-to-date client profiles, and follow all Kuubiik internal policies and protocols. 
   Essential Duties and Responsibilities: 
  
    Admin: Inbox management, Calendar management, Scheduling, Standard business correspondence, Transcription, Travel planning, Research, Expense management, Candidate screening, Data entry.
    Marketing: Social media management, Content copywriting: articles, website, social media posts, emails, Email marketing, Reports and analytics. Be able to be the link between the client and the marketing team for more advanced marketing requests.
    Web support and maintenance: Update images, Update content, Update links
    Graphic Design: Coordinate Graphic Design requests from client and assign them to graphic designing team accordingly.
    Video Editing: Able to understand video requests from client and transcript that request into a task for the video editing team.
    Customer service: Live chat support, Responding to customer inquiries (excluding IT inquiries), Answering questions about a company’s products or services, Setting up meetings & follow ups, Delivering information about a company’s offerings, Providing proactive customer outreach, Collecting and analyzing customer feedback, Responding to customer reviews
   
   The VE must provide continuous clear communication about task status, needs, and questions to their clients. They should 
  
    acknowledge all tasks assigned within the established time frame
    ensure that they understand expected due dates, and communicate any changes or delays with the client
    ensure the client is aware of hour usage and renewal dates.
   
   Desired Skills and Attributes: 
  
    Clear, precise, excellent, proactive, and professional written and verbal communication skills
    Ability to organize and effectively prioritize tasks
    Ability to multi-task with various programs and learn new programs as required
    Ability to commit to a minimum year contract
    Must have meticulous attention to detail, along with the ability to comprehend difficult tasks
    Capable of responding to stress in a fast-paced environment
    Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to quickly develop working relationships
    Affable and enthusiastic attitude towards teamwork
    Internet/Web savvy
   
   Job Type: Part-time or Contract for Service 
   Salary: SGD15.00 to SGD20.00 per hour
